headline: Eversource Energy Provides Update on Offshore Wind Liability
summary: HARTFORD, Conn. & BOSTON, October 14, 2025--Eversource Energy (NYSE: ES) today announced that it has increased its liability related to expected future payments to Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP) as part of the September 30, 2024, sale of the South Fork Wind and Revolution Wind projects (collectively, the Offshore Wind Projects) by approximately $285 million. Eversource also expects to realize an approximately $210 million federal tax benefit associated with the tax losses on the sales of i
